title: What is Cape Fear Community College going to do about the sound system at the new Cape Fear Humanities and Fine Arts Center? The third floor balcony should be closed off until something is done!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/02/what-is-cape-fear-community-college-going-to-do-about-the-sound-system-for-the-new-humanities-and-fine-arts-center/
